Showerhead flow rates are regulated by state plumbing codes, which are usually slightly modified versions of either IAPMO’s Uniform Plumbing Code or ICC’s International Plumbing Code. These override very lax 1992 EPAct water efficiency regulations. Minimum allowable pressure is also regulated here.
